summary:
After analyzing the website https://www.scrapethissite.com/pages/forms/, here's what information can be scraped: Team Name
, Year
, Wins
, Losses
, OT Losses
, Win %
, Goals For (GF)
, Goals Against (GA)
, + / -

content_zones.description: Contains the primary hockey team statistics table and search/pagination controls
Holds the main table with team statistics data
Navigation elements for moving between pages of results

structural_characteristics: Data presented in a structured HTML table format
Rows represent individual team records for specific years
Pagination system allows navigation through multiple pages of data
Search functionality modifies URL parameters to filter results
scraping_challenges: Pagination required to collect complete dataset across multiple pages
Dynamic URL changes with search and pagination parameters
Need to handle both integer and float data types correctly
Some cells may contain negative values (e.g., +/- column)
Page loads additional content dynamically through pagination links
